description: Just off the Highway in Dunster this trail follows a former sheep drive trail to the alpine meadows above. The first ridge above the tree line provides a 5 star view of the adjacent Natural Stone Arch provincial park. From there, numerous above treeline ridges and peaks can be reached, however no trails are marked.
directions: From McBride, follow highway 16 E for approximately 36 km and turn left on McNaughton Rd. The trailhead is at the end of McNaughton road at a gravel pit.
title: Groenveld Trail
